# Test: --spawner-cmd with nonexistent command fails with clear error
gitinit
cp kamaji.yaml kamaji.yaml
exec git add .
exec git commit -m 'init'

! exec kamaji start --spawner-cmd=nonexistent-command-12345
stderr 'executable file not found'

-- kamaji.yaml --
name: test
base_branch: main
tickets:
  - name: TEST-1
    branch: feat/test-1
    tasks:
      - description: Task 1
